name: HIGH LANDING BULLET but LOW ON BULLET
name_original: HIGH LANDING BULLET but LOW ON BULLET
description:
game for GMTK GameJam 2019
=====================

You've finally obtained the Ledgendary bullet!
But sadly that bullet is the last bullet you've got, And out of nowhere some weirdos that wants to take your bullet back to it's lair are comming to kill you!
Now, you have to kill as many as possible with one shot!

GET KILLING!

How to play
-----------------
ARROW KEYS to move
Hold Z to begin current wave by shooting a bullet.
You can deflect / push away bullet by holding Z. Releasing Z will also attract the bullet.

If the bullet hits you, You're going to die (obviously).
Also if you let the bullet hit the wall, You're gonna lose it, Rendering you helpless from all those weirdos that will kill you.

ETC
-----------------
Music made with Bosca Ceoil [https://boscaceoil.net/]
Intermission music "Joplin Scott Joplin's New Rag" (heavily edited) is from [https://musopen.org/music/43174-scott-joplins-new-rag/]

------------------------------

GLHF!

MMXIX ZIK
